post_text:
First time posting! Let me know your thoughts please 💙 Can’t find a meaning anywhere. I dreamt over three consecutive nights with the element of water in it…

First night of dreaming: I was running away from a day time rain, the skies were a beautiful bright blue. It was coming after me, I didn’t want it to touch me. I was jumping from roof top to rooftop in a place that resembled the favela of Brazil. Suddenly there’s a helicopter and someone who I can’t see their face reaches their hand out to me and pulls me inside before the rain could touch me. I’m dry and saved. I wake up.

Second night of dreaming: I’m now wet, the rain has touched me. I’m in a forest somewhere. There’s a women who feels like a spirit. I only see her from the back, I can’t tell her age wether she’s young or old, maybe she had white braided hair and wearing native clothes. she’s running somewhere and I feel like I must follow her, so I do. She leads me to shelter. I wake up.

Third night of dreaming: I’m alone and dry. I’m on a beach somewhere, and in the distance of the horizon is the most magical scene I’ve ever seen. There’s a massive tsunami wave touching the skies like it was reaching out for heaven, wide as the eye can see everywhere I look from left to right. It stayed in it’s place, just flowing up, it wasn’t coming after me. The sunset was shining through it, illuminating its power and beauty. I was in awe and wonder, mesmerized and unafraid. I felt empowered. I wake up.
comment_text:
Water is often associated with emotions, the unconscious or spirituality. With the native woman and the wonder of the third dream Im certainly getting spiritual vibes. Im wondering if tgey are giving different views on the same scenario? In the first its saving from facing the waters through unnatural means (the helicopter - often a symbol of ego as it rotates around itself); the second is a spiritual journey based in nature, the third, unguided wonder, but maybe lacking understanding?

These are my favourite kind of dreams but often don't seem to have a simple answer or interpretation.

Agree with Timothy. Water would typically represent the unconscious and/or emotions.

Interesting that the tidal wave was not destructive. I would ordinarily think it might represent the power of subconsciously repressed emotions, running away from them like the first dream suggests, but probably not if it left you struck by awe and wonder, empowered. The woods is sometimes said to be a symbol of the Self.

post_text:
https://www.facebook.com/geriann1981/posts/10166580839400492

Julie Phillips
23 April at 18:49 ·

This morning i had a #horrible dream.
I was the prisoner of a man. I seemed to be kept in his big, rich house. I don't remember how i got there, but i guess i was kidnapped.
Although i didn't actually see it in the dream i know he tortured & raped me.
He totally controlled my life. Even deciding when/if i could eat.
I wasn't so bother about the rape...obviously i didn't want to have sex with him but i could cope with that. It was the physical violence/torture that made being there terrifying.
I knew it was best to go along with whatever he did or he'd do something worse to me, but some things scared me more than others. I was scared of pain, but i was also scared of drowning & anything that could suffocate me. {I should mention that in real-life i'm scared of those things}
In the dream their was 1 time i knew he was about to do something terrible to me. He handed me a scrunched up cloth rag & told me to put it in my mouth. It scared me because i didn't know why he wanted me to do it, but i put it in my mouth. I put it in the front of my mouth, so my mouth was open. Then he said "no, put it further in & close your mouth." I pushed the cloth further in a tiny bit & closed my lips over it. I'm sure he knew i was avoiding having the cloth further back in my mouth because i was scared of choking.
By this time i'd been with him months at the very least, so he'd know what scared me the most.
He told me to open my mouth, then with 1 finger he poked the cloth further in my mouth. I felt the cloth partly cover the back of my mouth, so i was instantly scared of choking or suffocating. Then i saw him pick up a reel of Duct tape. I knew he was going to tape my mouth closed...with the cloth in my mouth.
I coughed out the cloth & began begging him not to have the cloth in my mouth. I was crying hysterically. I asked him what he was going to do to me...he said "you'll find out".
I pleaded with him not to put the cloth in my mouth [or the tape over my mouth] because i might choke/suffocate. His emotionless response was "well if you keep crying your nose will block & then you will suffocate. So stop crying & do what i say."
Of course that made my fear even worse. So i put my hands together in a praying position & pleaded with him. I said "I'll do whatever you want, but please don't kill me like this."
He said "I don't want to kill you. I don't want to lose my slave. I'm just doing this to keep you quiet".
I was relieved he didn't intend to suffocate/choke me...although i wasn't sure he was telling the truth...but i was obviously terrified what he was going to do to me that what make me scream.
He said "you know if you don't do what i say you'll make things worse for yourself." But i was so desperate i carried on begging him. Then he suddenly grabbed me & held me infront of him...so i was stood infront of him, facing away from him. He held my arms down & was about to put the cloth in my mouth. I couldn't break free from him so in a panic i blurted out "i'm pregnant". I didn't for a second think he'd care about a baby, but i was willing to say anything to stop him. [I don't think i was pregnant but i don't know]
He froze & said "what?"...I said "I'm pregnant. So anything you do to me will hurt your baby". He let go of me & i turned around to face him. He asked me when i found out. I said yesterday. He seemed shocked & asked why didn't i tell him. I said i thought you wouldn't care & you might kill our baby. He said he wouldn't do that to his own baby.
He said that me being pregnant changed everything & that he wasn't going to hurt me. I was confused that he could be so cruel to me, but care for his unborn baby.
He sat me down at his kitchen table [we'd been in the kitchen this whole time] & gave me a plate of food to eat. I thanked him & started wolfing down the food because i was so hungry. [that's because he usually only fed me enough to keep me going]
He said there's no need for me to eat it like that. He said he was sorry & he was going to look after me from now on.

👩‍👦I should mention that in this dream there was a little boy...I guess about 2 years old...who was often with me in the man's house. I know he wasn't my child, but often came to me instead of the man. For some weird reason that little boy was sometimes a #cat! So he could go in & out the man's house when he was a cat.

🐱The last time i dreamt of a cat was April 17th...that was of my passed cat Simba.
🦋The last time i dreamt of something morphing [aka a #ShapeShifter] was April 12th...that was a bird changing into different birds. That dream is here... https://www.facebook.com/geriann1981/posts/10166550650655492
👶The last time i dreamt of a baby & being pregnant was April 5th. That's here... https://www.facebook.com/geriann1981/posts/10166531305560492
🩸The last time i dreamt of being abducted/held captive/controlled was April 9th. That dream is here... https://www.facebook.com/geriann1981/posts/10166543272320492
🩸The last time i dreamt of being beaten/raped/tortured was March 25th. That dream is here... https://www.facebook.com/geriann1981/posts/10166499976650492

For you dream interpreters out there. I had a dream last night where I was at some yard sale and saw a beautiful carved desk. It was an antique and very detailed. I reach into a small drawer and drew out a big wad of money. Very old money - and I stole it.
then I woke up. I wonder what that dream means. Please...im not a thief -\-\ but I had the strong knowledge that I was being very wrong and sneaky.

ive had other dreams where I steal jewelry from an old jewelry box -\-\ so this dream is kind of a repeat which usually means its important to figure out (or I will keep on having these dreams).
comment_text: Taking money from the desk symbolizes taking something or claiming something that is not yours for yourself when it not yours. This is the guilt. This ornate desk symbolizes someone else's creativity. You are claiming something that is not yours in the dream.

post_text:
For you dream interpreters out there. I had a dream last night where I was at some yard sale and saw a beautiful carved desk. It was an antique and very detailed. I reach into a small drawer and drew out a big wad of money. Very old money - and I stole it.
then I woke up. I wonder what that dream means. Please...im not a thief -\-\ but I had the strong knowledge that I was being very wrong and sneaky.

ive had other dreams where I steal jewelry from an old jewelry box -\-\ so this dream is kind of a repeat which usually means its important to figure out (or I will keep on having these dreams).
comment_text:
Hi Patricia, you are completely right, recurring dream themes hold special power, so well done asking for the clarity on dream's message.
I ll preface the dream that everything in the dream is you/aspect of you and so finding this ornate desk in a yard sale symbolism is a dream's way of saying you need to find (and appreciate) your own beauty and by going further inside /opening certain part of you/checking the inside, you are to discover your value. Yard sale would indicate some sentiment around old stuff/no longer serving/but also letting go as people are usually doing it when decluttering/
moving on
There is a feeling of guilt that has surfaced in the dream but try to work with and identify the presence of this feeling in your body away from the actual imagery (which the dream is just using to open your eyes to this guilt).
Sometimes giving yourself the permission to find your beauty and value (again) will come with a hinged guilt attached ('who do you think you are' type of voice) and this guilt can be cultural and societal /passed down the family line..not to absolve from our own, but do take a wider view when looking at this.
Desk is a female symbol here (curiously no chair mentioned). Finally, desk can be an invitation to writing, like journaling to try get to deeper layers of yourself.
reply_text: i also remember that the paper money was falling apart, so old it was crumbling. I couldnt spend it or even give it away. The actual material was worthless..

Sometimes giving yourself the permission to find your beauty and value (again) will come with a hinged guilt attached ('who do you think you are' type of voice) and this guilt can be cultural and societal /passed down the family line..not to absolve from our own, but do take a wider view when looking at this.
Desk is a female symbol here (curiously no chair mentioned). Finally, desk can be an invitation to writing, like journaling to try get to deeper layers of yourself.
reply_text:
I DO journal alot, and have done some public speaking. I've done some writing, mostly autobiographica
l, some poetry.

For you dream interpreters out there. I had a dream last night where I was at some yard sale and saw a beautiful carved desk. It was an antique and very detailed. I reach into a small drawer and drew out a big wad of money. Very old money - and I stole it.
then I woke up. I wonder what that dream means. Please...im not a thief -\-\ but I had the strong knowledge that I was being very wrong and sneaky.

ive had other dreams where I steal jewelry from an old jewelry box -\-\ so this dream is kind of a repeat which usually means its important to figure out (or I will keep on having these dreams).

post_text:
Dreamt that I was in a house with my partner and as I looked outside, I could see black clouds almost touching the ground passing by in the open field. In the dream, I felt a bit of anxiety, thinking I've never seen such darck clouds ever before. As I looked out the window, I could see a cowboy hearding a beautiful black horse out of the storm's way. The rider looked worryed and he was pushing his horse as hard as he could to get out of the way, but the storm was catching up with him. It felt like he was trying to protect the stallion ahead of him (which looked quite small in comparison). Inside the house, my partner was holding onto a piece of furniture as the house started to shake as the storm was coming closer.
Can you give me a clue, please? I looked into it and found pieces of information that I cannot out together to form a coherent idea.

Thank you so much Xx
The below picture is to give a sense of the clouds and the solitude of the house in the middle of the field.
comment_text: The horse being herded away from a dark cloud is a challenge in life coming that needs attention. It could be something that you are aware of and this dream is saying to pay attention before this over takes you. The cowboy symbolizes help that is there for you.
reply_text: Roy De Ruyter Yes, absolutely! Makes sense now. Thank you so much for your reply. 🙏

post_text: I’m not sure where the dream started but all I remember is it starting in the middle for me, I was in my room and a girl i went to school with little sister was there like sitting by a drain and she told me that she kept feeling something touch her through the drain and I look over and she’s not there anymore and I see them trying to grab a stuffed animal that was right beside her thinking it’s me or something and I hit their hand and I screamed, what did you do with, Izzy, but that’s not even her name. I’m freaking out because I’m thinking how much strength did they have to have to pull this little red headed girl through and drain, and how messed up her body was look now! (This whole time I was crying.) So I tell everyone in the house that someone is going through the drains and trying to steal people or anything they can grab. So I get advised by someone to go tell my father which is at my neighbors franks, as I’m telling him what’s happening, the across the street neighbor truck starts going off as if someone’s breaking in. (I want to add some better description of how close we live , imagine a square and it’s three houses but my house has two acres so it would take up the room for the forth house to have our houses right across the street from each other’s) so my dad and frank look at each other and say that’s probably him and after they say that the older guy right across the street with his truck broken into step out his door and screams. “HES HEADED YALLS WAY” so the person who broke in was a mid sized,black male. But I remembered seeing a white hand through the drain. So sense we live so close I tried to run to my house for safety and it was too late, my dad pull out his Glock the guy pulled out his gun and two shots were fired and I just shut my eye and I seen white, and it was like as if I felt the bullets as well but I just kept walking towards my house. I didn’t even look to see who had died I just went back to my room crying to my mom and my boyfriend and as I’m on the floor like hysterically crying I stand up and through the window I see the black male wrapped up (dead) and being put into like a police van. I distinctly remember after I seen his dead body in my head I went “I just seen a dead body”. I went into more of a shock and then more of a hysterical cry, and I remember my mom trying to get my grandma to come out and to calm me down, she gets to my house I head outside, and the last part before I woke I just remember sinking into her arms while falling on the prettiest, greenest grass I’ve ever seen.
comment_text:
This is a pretty complex dream, Im nit sure I have any solid ideas; but it does seem to relate to being influenced by outside forces (those taking people through the drain) snd being intruded upon, feeling threatened and conflict.

Since it isnt the black man I think the dream might be hinting the real threat is not the clear seemingly obvious intrusion but rather the seemingly impossible reverse way (through the drain).

The grass at the end seems significant, makes me think of lush rich personal growth but through great sorrow and difficulty?
reply_text: Timothy Kippo it’s been rough. But I’ve been forcing myself to grow, even tho I have no motivation for anything, I graduated two month early with really good grades.

Trigger Warning ⚠️

Recently I've had a reoccurring dream about a rape. However, in the dream itself I wake up from a deep sleep having a nightmare about rape. I wake up(in the dream) and some random guy is shaking his head holding me. I look at him confused and he just says he's saved me. Any thoughts and ideas? I've had it s few times now. He feels very familiar.
comment_text: Rape is often a symbol if being robbed of dignity and power; it could be aspects of your own psyche waking you up from your own state of being robbed of your own power? As in you yourself are the one that can empower/save yourself from being powerless?
reply_text: Timothy Kippo So who's the man in my dream?

post_text:
Hello and welcome to the group!

I hope you enjoy and get value from it. This is a group for people interested in dreams but we are generally not professionals or doing this for money, rather for entertainment/self exploration purposes only.

Our interpreters (anyone can interpret) are volunteers and not paid or dedicated to spending all their time here, so please treat them with respect even if what they say doesn't resonate - likewise when interpreting it helps to frame the interpretation as your opinion as opposed to instructing on what the dream means.

If you don't receive a response it is nothing personal, just bad timing. You can post a comment to bump your dream to the top of the feed. I have asked Facebook for a no response filter but so far that hasn't happened, would make things a lot easier!

Please also observe the following recommendations:

Please do not contact interpreters by PM unless they give you permission to do so.

A PM can only be requested by a dreamer - if you are asking Dreamer's to contact you, you will be removed from the group.

Do not use this group to self promote.

Please post more than just a single dream symbol (eg don't just say "I dreamt of a white snake whats it mean?"). Share the whole dream.
comment_text: Thanks for accepting my request. I have many dreams i need help understanding and.I have hope that I will get that help here with you all.

comment_text:
I personally would prefer is members would make it their standard to add the following information for a better, more personal explanation.

Things like:

How did the dream make you feel?
(Happy,scared, annoyed, angry etc.)

In what scenery did the dream take place?
(Beach, woods, living room, on the streets etc.)

Mention special, outstanding details
(the color of a car, if the room had windows/doors or not, did the person have a face etc.)

Do u remember having a semi similar dream before? If so, when was it? & could you describe it, or at least mention any similarities you still remember. If you had more then 2 similar dreams, please list their similarities. Like they all had blue cars, or big fishes in them.
(This will indicate if this is a topic that has occupied the dreamer for a longer time. Especially if the dreamer has had multiple dreams with big fish in them, in combination with how the dreams made them feel, is very telling!!!)

I am probably forgetting alot more, however at this moment i think this would be my last request:

A little bit of their back story/current life situation.
(Like in a relationship/
single, religious or not, going to school/working/
unemployed, kids/pets or not, etc. If they dont want to disclose i completely understand however it is very significant for dreams. Like if you dream you are getting married but in fact dont even have a partner, its very different from when you do. Same goes for kids, dream of giving birth when in fact you arent pregnant nor have you ever been, is very different from someone who had 3 kids with a fourth on its way. And if you dream about being or going to school alot, but you haven't been in school for over 20 years, it means something completely different then for someone who is just starting collage... well i think u catch my drift... )

(HOWEVER i need to add one more thing in regards to religion.... put thats more of an opinion then anything else.... to each his own& i honestly respect everyones beliefs, religion & traditions... However it does bother me sometimes that some members plant seeds of panic, in an already panicked member by saying demons are coming for them and they need to pray. Stuff like that.... like, in what way is that a dream explanation?? If they would atleast explain why they state these things... but no. Without any explanation they post under many nightmare posts, to pray, go to church, call the priest, burn sage etc. Like yo i am willing to do all for you, ill ask the pope himself to cleanse your home if it was demon invested... but yooo these "demons" in your dreams, arent real demons, they are symbolic for something, like struggling with your inner demons...
Ok so i needed to get this off my chest, because this is just installing unnecessary fear in people. And it has nothing to do with the actual meaning of a dream.... Dreams contain real important messages for what happends within for us to be unraveled, we dont need prayers but serious dream volunteers to unraffle them. )

(We need priests, prayers, sage, lucky charms & the police or ghost busters to protect us. Lets give them a break and not involve them in dream descriptions.)
reply_text: Elisah Meis I agree but we've noticed many of our dreamers arent always English proficient because its not their primary language so sometimes we have to work with it

post_text:
I had a dream that I had a bunch of puppies in my house & an aggressive dog got in & started taking all the puppies one by one & putting them in a tent in the back garden I was crying & hiding terrified. It was dark & rainy in the garden & every time the dog was bringing one out I was bringing one back in trying to save them but hiding so I wasn’t seen. I was going back & forth when I realised one of the puppies were drowning in a paddling pool that was filling fast with the rain, I tried to save the puppy but I couldn’t, the aggressive dog wouldn’t stop barking at me & biting at my clothes but I was just crying holding this dead pup in the rain.

what could this mean?
one of the most vivid & horrible dreams Iv ever had. 😞
comment_text:
The house is a symbol of self. I think this is a symbol of you in conflict with some unconscious process: the yard being the unconscious, the interior the conscious. I think you are in conflict with a natural but unempathic unconscious process (the aggressive dog) that is trying to put something outside of your conscious awareness but you keep bringing it back inside ie keep thinking about it?

Not sure what the puppies actually represent...

post_text: Goodmorning, I had a dream that my friends and I died. Before we died we talked about the outcome of our lives and what we will do when we come back to earth🤔 We all than died together only to return to earth being reborn to different families, as we got older we reunited, but they couldn't remember the agreement only I did..So I spent sometime trying to get them to understand everything was planned before we came back to earth 😩 Wow I woke up confused...

post_text:
So my friend had a dream she had sex with a ghost. She said “it was weird bc he told me he died, he didn’t tell me how. My soul knew he was dead, but it was almost like he was more like a time traveler. I knew exactly what he looked like bc he would show himself, he appeared in human form and he couldn’t remember how to go back to his ghost form. He felt real, the dream felt real, and weirdly it felt like we had a soul connection. It was like I had known him for years but I had just met him.”

I’m curious if anyone can help me figure this out for her? I have tried looking up the meaning but can’t really find anything on it. I personally do not think it was a succubus, but I really don’t know how to interpret it to help her make sense of it.
comment_text:
Only she can really understand it when the pieces click, but you might be able to help give clues she is overlooking with an outsiders perspective.

For starters the sex is quite possibly not even about sex at all. In fact I'd argue this is an Animus dream using sex as a symbol of integration. That male I suspect represents masculine aspects of her own psyche she rejected in the past and "killed off" from her persona (hence ghost of her past) that she is now reconnecting with and accepting. There is a soul connection there because it is the Animus ie a part of her soul.

comment_text: If you have desires to be pregnant it might relate to anxiety connected to that. If you have no pregnancy thoughts it could relate to something new in your life you've started that seems to have stalled out. Skie Sarfaraz

post_text: Hi everyone. Today I was woken up by a voice saying my name loud and urgently. I immediately jumped out of bed to find my husband and baby asleep with obviously no one else in our house. It was extremely clear, almost like they were right next to me. Has this happened to anyone else? What does it mean?
comment_text: Yes happens to me often. The other day I heard my kids voice say “mom,mom” and I woke up and yelled “WHAT?” 😂 then a few months back I was woken up by a male screaming voice in my head saying “are you sober”. I have prob had this happen about 10 times in my life with the first time being in like 2015 when I thought I heard my name in the living room after waking up. I have woken up to seeing shadows in the room also. Last time was about 4 months ago, there was a shadow of a man sitting at the dining table. It didn’t scare me though didn’t seem to be a real thing, I was also veryyy sleep deprived then. My sleep doctor said it sounds like hypnagogic hillucinations.

post_text: Hi everyone. Today I was woken up by a voice saying my name loud and urgently. I immediately jumped out of bed to find my husband and baby asleep with obviously no one else in our house. It was extremely clear, almost like they were right next to me. Has this happened to anyone else? What does it mean?
comment_text: This is called a hypnogogic hallucination. It's very common. I've experienced it several times. It's the brain playing tricks as you wander between sleep state and awake state. This experience is very unsettling but I don't believe there is any value in trying to interpret it.

post_text:
Ok so, I had a friend who passed in a pretty messed up way. There is suspected foul play.

I had a dream about her and I just want some thoughts and opinions…

In the dream, I walked into a room (I’d never been to this house nor seen it) and saw her hanging out with some of our other friends. She had already passed and was a ghost. I laid down beside her and caressed her face. I said, “I’m so happy to see you *****.” She said, “I’m not *****, I’m *****.” But I just can’t remember the name she said.

That gave me weird vibes but I just went with it. She asked me to go into the bathroom with her and I did. She started trying to put her fingers into my mouth and literally tear it open. Then she started trying to put her mouth on mine, violently.

We seemed to teleport from the bathroom to a car that she was is control of and wrecked. Then we seemed to teleport back to the house. I saw few people talking. It was said that, “The doll she gave her was an investigator.” I was hiding. She didn’t see me at first and I was trying to leave before she did. I made it outside but she saw me on the porch. She was trying to full on attack and a few other ghosts of people I knew were helping but I can’t remember who they were now.

I kept repeating, “I banish thee!” Over and over until I woke up.

I know that I knew everyone but I can’t remember names or who anyone was but her.

Now I just feel so uneasy and weird.
comment_text: That this lady didn't go by the name you called her is saying that you really didn't know her. To me this dream is saying that your friend wasn't who she seemed and the rest of the dream where things are switching around and you hiding is you are finding this out. That you are casting her out in the dream symbolizes her false face.

You had a very strong connection with her it seems. She was opening your mouth violently because she was herself struggling to express herself. As I see this, she probably thought about some of the people she could call during her final moments. As you have said the accident was bad, perhaps she had some moments of fear. Perhaps the images that reached you triggered some fear and she was struggling to get through.

Either way, her being with a group should indicate she's not alone and helpless as she might have felt. It's in my book a beautiful sign as well and perhaps she just came over to say hi and the rest of it was you both having a conversation in which you were trying to tell her how deeply hurt you are, and perhaps she was trying to tell you that she was ready to move on..

post_text: Had a weird dream that some guy was trying to get me pregnant with a tiger LMAO. Wtf does that mean? There wasn't any sex involved.. Just injected.
comment_text:
It probably has nothing to do with sex and literal pregnancy. ie the man and the tiger are symbolic, eg an idea.

The man could be some external influence (eg another person or form of media) or some unconscious internal process.

The tiger has a lot of potential connotations, eg powerful feminune sexuality, or some kind of duality (stripes).

Certainly not a definitive interpretation but hopefully a starting point.

post_text: Had a weird dream that some guy was trying to get me pregnant with a tiger LMAO. Wtf does that mean? There wasn't any sex involved.. Just injected.
comment_text:
Idea of pregnancy can symbolize personal growth, new perspective, rebirth

Tiger however "doesn't change it's stripes" so this imagery might be contradictory..
.

It reminds me of the phrase "plus ca change, plus ca reste le meme"= the more things change the more they stay the same

It might be that you are or someone you know is encouraging you to develop a new aspect of yourself, but that this new aspect of you would be similar to how you have been before in life.

It is also interesting that the man is trying to impregnate you using the tiger, when the logical thing would be for a man to try himself - sex can sometimesbe about growing closer to someone, but it can also symbolize integration.

Is there any example in life right now of trying to connect with a part of yourself or in a relationship with another person where it feels impractical, experimental, awkward or unnatural?

Tiger is also a wild animal, it can be about embracing your animal instincts, as Timothy says above perhaps female sexuality. It might be that someone you know, likely male, is encouraging you to connect with this part of yourself.

Maybe that a closeness with someone else is surprisingly turning into an opportunity to connect with part of yourself.

Pregnancy usually means "that a new idea/life path is brewing"
Considering that I would match it with the following meaning of a tiger:
The tiger could represent your ambition, career, or studies. And the dream could be a reminder for you to work harder or maybe it's admonishing you to stop procrastinating
.

Sooo I think the dream means the following:

You are about to make big steps towards your goals, but for some reason you are doubtful. Perhaps this has to do with the fact that you wonder if you will be up for it.

Also, I wasn’t gonna mention this second dream. But, there was a girl I used to go to primary school with and once in a blue moon I have dreams about her. I don’t think about her in waking life and I haven’t spoken to her for several years. I just think it’s odd. If you want the details of the dream from last night I was in a shopping isle with her and she was just sitting on the ground. I can’t remember the rest so it’s nothing to go off really. I’m just more intrigued as to why I dream about her?

If anyone can decipher the interpretations behind these dreams, I’d really appreciate it.
comment_text:
I think the girl from school is a symbolic representation of part of yourself that is a key part of this girls personality or role. How you view her and whether thats a topical issue at the time of the dream is a good starting point.

As for the hair, thats not easy really. Since it comes from the head it can relate to thought, but could also be about how you present/
organise yourself outwardly, lots of ways to look at hair.

Blue and purple, its hard not to look at chakras, especially licated around the head so might be about communication (blue) or intuition (purple); but again other associations you could delve into.
reply_text: Timothy Kippo thank you so much 😊

post_text:
Been a while since I last posted about a dream - they were mostly disturbing, but this one last night was out of the blue.

I dreamt that I was in a seaside town somewhere. I was actually going to see someone. Someone who was popular on tv and was able to keep the magic of childhood alive for many people (still doing it today). I stopped outside a house which was next to a beach. It wasn’t a flashy beach house but it had a homey cosy look and feel to it. This man came out, and I asked for the person in question I was looking for, and I was told I was at the right place and to go in. There I met the person I was looking for. And he was actually really nice and friendly and chatty. He showed me around the house and he took me to one room, and I saw the most amazing collection of memorabilia of this tv childhood. And that w was when I woke up.

I want to add that I have met this person a couple of times in real life, and he is a great person and very friendly.

Also the dream had no sinister intentions.

What do you think this means?
comment_text: My best guess is it relates to finding a balanced peaceful child-like (free from worries) state associated with childhood. I don't understand the context though, ie whether this is what is going on, or if its more a desire or goal.

comment_text:
I personally would prefer is members would make it their standard to add the following information for a better, more personal explanation.

Things like:

How did the dream make you feel?
(Happy,scared, annoyed, angry etc.)

In what scenery did the dream take place?
(Beach, woods, living room, on the streets etc.)

Mention special, outstanding details
(the color of a car, if the room had windows/doors or not, did the person have a face etc.)

Do u remember having a semi similar dream before? If so, when was it? & could you describe it, or at least mention any similarities you still remember. If you had more then 2 similar dreams, please list their similarities. Like they all had blue cars, or big fishes in them.
(This will indicate if this is a topic that has occupied the dreamer for a longer time. Especially if the dreamer has had multiple dreams with big fish in them, in combination with how the dreams made them feel, is very telling!!!)

I am probably forgetting alot more, however at this moment i think this would be my last request:

A little bit of their back story/current life situation.
(Like in a relationship/
single, religious or not, going to school/working/
unemployed, kids/pets or not, etc. If they dont want to disclose i completely understand however it is very significant for dreams. Like if you dream you are getting married but in fact dont even have a partner, its very different from when you do. Same goes for kids, dream of giving birth when in fact you arent pregnant nor have you ever been, is very different from someone who had 3 kids with a fourth on its way. And if you dream about being or going to school alot, but you haven't been in school for over 20 years, it means something completely different then for someone who is just starting collage... well i think u catch my drift... )

(HOWEVER i need to add one more thing in regards to religion.... put thats more of an opinion then anything else.... to each his own& i honestly respect everyones beliefs, religion & traditions... However it does bother me sometimes that some members plant seeds of panic, in an already panicked member by saying demons are coming for them and they need to pray. Stuff like that.... like, in what way is that a dream explanation?? If they would atleast explain why they state these things... but no. Without any explanation they post under many nightmare posts, to pray, go to church, call the priest, burn sage etc. Like yo i am willing to do all for you, ill ask the pope himself to cleanse your home if it was demon invested... but yooo these "demons" in your dreams, arent real demons, they are symbolic for something, like struggling with your inner demons...
Ok so i needed to get this off my chest, because this is just installing unnecessary fear in people. And it has nothing to do with the actual meaning of a dream.... Dreams contain real important messages for what happends within for us to be unraveled, we dont need prayers but serious dream volunteers to unraffle them. )

(We need priests, prayers, sage, lucky charms & the police or ghost busters to protect us. Lets give them a break and not involve them in dream descriptions.)
reply_text: Elisah Meis I agree but we've noticed many of our dreamers arent always English proficient because its not their primary language so sometimes we have to work with it

post_text:
Hello and welcome to the group!

I hope you enjoy and get value from it. This is a group for people interested in dreams but we are generally not professionals or doing this for money, rather for entertainment/self exploration purposes only.

Our interpreters (anyone can interpret) are volunteers and not paid or dedicated to spending all their time here, so please treat them with respect even if what they say doesn't resonate - likewise when interpreting it helps to frame the interpretation as your opinion as opposed to instructing on what the dream means.

If you don't receive a response it is nothing personal, just bad timing. You can post a comment to bump your dream to the top of the feed. I have asked Facebook for a no response filter but so far that hasn't happened, would make things a lot easier!

Please also observe the following recommendations:

Please do not contact interpreters by PM unless they give you permission to do so.

A PM can only be requested by a dreamer - if you are asking Dreamer's to contact you, you will be removed from the group.

Do not use this group to self promote.

Please post more than just a single dream symbol (eg don't just say "I dreamt of a white snake whats it mean?"). Share the whole dream.
comment_text: Thanks for the add

post_text:
Felt like sharing this here for others to read or get a kick out of and even interpret if you like. I compiled this list for no particular reason.

Top weirdest or most intense dreams I have had before in my life that are hard to forget...

1. The Clown Birth and the Confetti Baby 👶 🎊 🤡
Sometime between my teens or early 20s, I had dreamt I was pregnant(I'm a cis straight male, fyi) and I was going to the hospital to deliver when the doctor showed up as a clown and all my wet nurses were oompa loompas. When I had delivered it was a baby made of confetti string and confetti paper.

2. Waking the Dragon 🐉 👮‍♂️ 🗡 ⚰
In the past 5-7 years I had this dream that I was attending a funeral of a fellow officer of the law like myself in the dream(I've never been a cop irl, but I was in military), when all mayham began suddenly and the sky was raining fire and brimstone everywhere. There was outside this sinkhole excavation in the middle of the black top road with slimy roots covered in mud and ice. Inside was also dragon skeleton in it that had come to life and regrew its flesh and scales when I charged into battle in a cop uniform and a sword, slaying it.

3. The Time Keep of Skeleton Keys and the Pegasus Flight 🔑 🏰🌥🐎
In the past year I had a dream that I was in this alt fantasy dimension or world where I was staying as a house guest to a farmer who let me stay for being an extra hand on his property. I had helped him bury what appeared to be both an animal and a son to this man when we left to go to his barn and inside was a trailer and his daughter who was calming an excited brownish redish Pegasus. She was a beautiful woman and her father made a comment about how she had a way with beasts. She and her friends invited me to tag along when we took that Pegasus and other mythical creatures out flying. I flew on the brownish redish pegasus. We had came across a castle/ citadel floating in the sky and landed. We searched the place which was empty and barren finding bags of magical skeleton keys that looked like normal keys and a note to me from a future me about a book I would one day write and how important it would be. We left flying away as the castle citadel was enveloped in a nasty thunderstorm behind us.

4. The Watery Overpass of Homeless Vets, a SeaLion with Lips wearing a Hoodie and the Subway Shelter in the Storm 🌪 🪖 📦 🧺 🛒 🦭
I had this dream roughly sometime in the past 3 years. I was walking like on a long distance hike 🚶‍♂️ and I came to rest in a highway overpass where there were homeless sleeping and people relaxing. There was a water way that came to the edge under the overpass where SeaLions relaxed catching their breath. One of these SeaLions had a brown zip up hoodie on and had lips like a human trying to catch his breath. A group of homeless vets surrounded me begging for help and trying to talk me into some kind of scheme. It gave me bad vibes so I got out of dodge and ran away. I came to a street market with vendor stalls set up everywhere on the side walks and along park area selling all kinds of goods from food to clothes and other specially hand made crafted goods. Suddenly a storm started out of nowhere and a tornado touched down. I took charge and led everyone to shelter in some kind of underground subway type of walking path where we all waited out the storm and I talked and soothed people into peace.

5. Interior Design, Psychic Spiritual Sermons, Hummingbird Friends and Acme Birds 🏡 🔮 🐦🥞
In the beginning of this dream, I was helping a pregnant couple plan their home and they wanted it so that their room and their child's room were connected by a doorway and wall like how some hotel rooms are constructed conjoined by a door in the middle of them. Later in the same dream I was outside a church like building where I gave a speech about spiritual topics and sat on a park bench explaining a divergence in timelines to a friend and stranger and how I offer psychic abilities to help people heal and grow in their own. A hummingbird flew up to my face in the dream at this time catching my attention then flying away just as another bird suddenly struck the ground like a rock as if gravity had been turned up really high really suddenly and very briefly when like a balloon this pancaked bird reinflated then flew away.

6. The Shadow Gorilla caged in the Grocer 🦍🏪🛒👨‍🔬🧪
This dream was sometime this past year when I had dreamt I was a scientist and had made a Grodd/Kong like Gorilla who absolutely hated me and wanted to destroy me. It chased me into a grocery store with an underground parking garage where I trapped it inside the grocery fleeing through the parking garage. My fellow associates showed up with a mind control device they built to sooth and calm the gorilla and asked me to use it but I was hesitant until I finally decided to try it but all I felt was this gorillas immense anger and hatred. I quickly took the device off and placed it down. I went and searched the vehicle and my associates purse for whatever reason looking for what I have no idea when out of the corner of my eye I noticed as my associates mindlessly chatted away the device was just sitting there as the gorilla got visually more and more angry and uncomfortable eventually blasting through the front wall and doors and I took off running. 🏃‍♂️

7. Mistress of Flame vs the Mistress of Ice and my City Night Life Lady Escapades. 🦸‍♀️🔥🏙👭
This dream was sometime between a year and two ago. I was a woman and I was a super hero with fire like abilities as well as empathetic telepathy. I was walking downtown with a male friend who was drunk that I was attempting to have get a cab home when a ball of fire fell from the sky landing in the lake new our downtown strip where we were walking. A woman walked out of the water covered in ice asking if she was seen when I told her that at least a half dozen cameras had seen her. She told me it was a shame to kill me then as she began hurling ice sickles at me that I blew up with fireballs. This continued for a while as she drew closer and closer to me while exchanging words when suddenly we locked arms and embraced making out with one another against a chain link fence.

8. Me Kissing Me in the Dark 🪞 💋 👫💏 🚪
I had this dream sometime in the past few months, where I was home alone on my computer looking up things. I sent my dog who I don't own or know into the kitchen and other room. There was a shuffling noise at my front door like someone messing with the handle. I went to open and see who was there when suddenly as I opened a women in shadows burst through grappling and embracing me pushing me into the room. We landed on the edge of my bed with her on top of me when I blurted out asking who she was was when she replied, "you" then began kissing me passionately.

So I had a weird ass dream last night, That I went to American idol met one of the cast members. They gave me some certificate && asked me if I wanted to be on x factor. Then I decided my new way of life, I was going to start dressing as a woman && putting on makeup. And towards the end I was going to break it to my mom my new way of life then I woke up. 🤨😂 TF!?!? LMFAO
comment_text: I feel the dream is asking you to recognise your own talents and step out into the spotlight. Let others see what you have to offer. Dressing as a women may mean you need to show people your more feminine caring and nurturing side.

post_text: I had a “power nap” dream in which I was going to a hair appointment with two friends and I let one drive my car. The car was white with black specks all over it. We arrived at the place and my aunt was there. We let one friend out and we went to park and once we did I got out of the car and couldn’t see because the sun was so bright. I went back for my sunglasses but my friend and my car was gone. I woke up briefly and fell back asleep only to continue the dream. I tried to make it over to my aunt but the place changed and I was wearing some type of mask and couldn’t see well. I also heard some strange music. At some point I had a different phone that I knew wasn’t mine and I didn’t know how to use it. All this in less than 30 mins
comment_text: Hi Emily, to me your dream could possibly be showing something which is not clear to you. This could be something which is making you feel powerless, lack of energy. I am wondering if you have a lot going on which is giving you no time for yourself.

post_text: So I had a dream about this man that I am friends with. We have talked off and on, yada yada. Anyways, the dream I see him in the distance and I want to be near him. I so much want to be there with him. I remember I walked up to him and we talked and I remember laying my head on his shoulder and just being so happy. We were like on rocks or something. Colorado? It was weird. Anyways this giant bolder started to fall and then the ground under us started to break and we started falling. He reached his hand out to me as we were falling and said, “what are you doing in 59 years?” (Weird, I know). Anyways I was never able to reach him and then I remembered my son. My son wasn’t with me and I started freaking out and then I woke up. Some song about changes was in my head as I was waking up( no radio or tv on) and so I sat up and looked at the clock and it was 12:34 which I thought was weird when you look at angel numbers and such.
comment_text: Do you have a crush on this man?

post_text:
In this dream, I sneaked in and eavesdrop to my friend who's talking to their other friend. While listening and hiding, I realized that what I'm doing is nonsensical but at that point, I can't get out from my hiding spot anymore or else I'll be caught. As I decide and think of what I should do, my friend caught me and seriously asked me to come out from my hiding spot.

What does it mean?

I dreamed about my dad giving me a ride to my doctors appointment. The time was 2:08PM. We saw red lights flashing at the railroad crossing. Dad stopped at the railroad crossing and waited for the train. We looked left and right to see if the freight train was approaching. Dad thought about going through. He did a U-Turn and went a different direction to the doctors office. We arrived at the doctors office. Dad walked ahead of me upstairs to the doctors office. I lost sight of him. I ran up the first flight of stairs then I heard footsteps thinking it was my dad walking up the steps but it was someone else. When I was about halfway up the steps I heard them announce my name on the Public Announcement System. I reached the 3rd floor where the doctors office was located I saw old clients sitting in their chairs then I woke up.

Can anyone help interpret this dream?
comment_text:
You might be on autopilot atm.
What I mean is you think logic and avoid thinking emotionally.

The train that isn’t coming is kinda of the expression “missing the train” but it isn’t quite it.
You “don’t see a train”.
You are waiting at flashing light so there is a sense of emergency/
danger ahead.
You do a u-turn.

It can be seen as “forget Plan A, let’s take plan B”.
(Change of directory instead of waiting… acting upon).

Going upstairs is seen as “improving your life”.
You dad is ahead of you.
Maybe you need guidance a little bit.

Doctors appointment is to “fix something with you.”

Fixing something maybe you aren’t feeling your top self and you aren’t sure how to fix it.

People being old could be wisdom or vulnerability.
As you reach a state where you feel you need more wisdom or you feel dependant/
vulnerable.

2:08 can be “infinite duality.”

Announcing of your name is “you want it to be your turn”.

That’s my take on it.
reply_text: Joëlle Klemer, Thank you for the interpretation.

post_text: I had a dream that my boyfriend went back to his ex. They came over, idk why she was here. But I walked in the back to get something and I come back to find them laying on the couch with her leg over him. I start to flip and cry and they laugh at me and he tells me this isn’t the first time he cheated on me. This is the second time I’ve had this dream. Except the first time, it was a dream of me seeing his phone with a blonde girl flirting with him and him flirting back. I asked God to show me the truth and then those dreams popped up and I’ve been feeling like his attention is somewhere else.. Is this my trust issues and fear or is this my intuition??
comment_text:
Have you had any past trauma along those lines? It could be your trauma talking do they still interact, do they have a kid together etc or hang out inappropriately
? If there is something that makes you feel that way you need to communicate it! ❤️

comment_text: Skylar Monn a side note, not from the dream, just an opinion. Trust in a relationship is very important, and it is better to have high standards about this - to have someone who is consistently open, honest, and shows care and commitment. It is something you want to feel certainty about if you plan to both invest in a shared life together. If you are finding that uncertainty, hold to a high standard, request that commitment, transparency, assurance, knowing it is better to be alone if that is what you need to do

post_text: I had a strange dream that my bathtub got left on and flooded my bathroom and I was trying to use my arms to push the water down the drain that were in the floor. Then somehow the scene changed to my boyfriend accusing me of being unfaithful. I asked him to leave, rather I screamed at him to leave and as he was leaving another woman showed up to escort him out. Thoughts?￼
comment_text: I feel you are currently overwhelmed with emotion in regards to your relationship in some way. Though the dream suggests you try to push your feelings down. I wonder if you feel your boyfriend dosnt appreciate you or your loyalty in some way?

post_text: I had a strange dream that my bathtub got left on and flooded my bathroom and I was trying to use my arms to push the water down the drain that were in the floor. Then somehow the scene changed to my boyfriend accusing me of being unfaithful. comment_text: You don't want to deal with the BS going on in your life. Some things you can't control, pushing the water back,which can't be dove, but there are things you can control, stress with boyfriend, so you tell him to leave. You do this knowing that you may lose him to someone else, but you don't want the stress.

post_text: Help! My friend is having a hard time he just went through a break up and every night since he’s been having the same nightmare. He stands in the middle of a ring of fire and spoke to hades the first time. Now it’s black and blurry and he hears mumbled voices then he wakes up. Any idea or any way to help him so he can stop having these dreams and not so scared to fall asleep?
comment_text: My thoughts are that he is passing through a trauma. The ring is a common symbol for a relationship, fire is anger. Speaking to hades suggests he has decended into his own "underworld", perhaps he needs to process his anger before he can break free and rise again.

post_text: Help! My friend is having a hard time he just went through a break up and every night since he’s been having the same nightmare. He stands in the middle of a ring of fire and spoke to hades the first time. Now it’s black and blurry and he hears mumbled voices then he wakes up. Any idea or any way to help him so he can stop having these dreams and not so scared to fall asleep?
comment_text:
I have heard about nightmare rehearsal therapy as a way of treating the symptoms. I can send papers about it if you'd like, but the steps are something like this:

1. Write down the dream narrative as it is
2. Write down a NEW version of the dream narrative that would turn the dream into a non-nightmare (for example, walking through the ring of fire, not being burnt, or maybe getting a hug from Hades, I don't know).
3. Practice "rehearsing" the dream in its *modified* version.
4. Supposedly this rehearsal will train the brain to modify the experience of the nightmare when it is dreamt.

To be clear I have never done this myself but the literature has shown promising results (has anyone here had success with this technique?).

Becoming lucid during the nightmare would be another strategy (I have done this and had success). If he's never lucid dreamt before it may take a bit of work, but becoming lucid and taking control of the dream would be one path.

However, I think these strategies both address the symptoms, and not the root cause. I tend to agree with Alexandra that processing the underlying emotions would be the way to truly resolve the problem, but these strategies may provide some relief if the nightmares are becoming an issue on their own.

post_text:
I had a dream that I was sitting on the floor with my husband in an unknown room a small white owl flew in & flew 3 circles around my husband and then landed in my hands. In my dream I remember saying to him, “wow if that isn’t a sign..”

I never dream about animals or anything of any significance, woke up feeling like this was a message from my mom who passed in December.

I fell back asleep after anxiously googling what this meant and had a second dream. This time I was lying on a dirty bathroom floor with my arm extended and there was a scorpion with its stinger resting on my finger. I remember feeling scared and hoping someone would help me but staying perfectly still as you would if you saw a bear or something ..in order not to be stung.

What could these mean/is there a connection? Thanks in advance 🤍
comment_text: I feel the dream suggests you are beginning to trust your own inner wisdom and intuition in regards to your husband. You may not be vocalising things yet but you are going around and around things in your mind. To me is seems you are poised for some kind of painfull event you know will hurt x

Had a strange dream a few days ago that is sticking in my head and making me think.

When I woke up I remembered the beginning of the dream, now I do not but I remember it was simple and insignificant and I didn't remember or understand how the dream ended up the way it did.
Something happened and I realized I was living in some kind of simulation. All I can remember is looking through different simulations, it seemed like I was almost being dropped in each one but could continue through to another as I pleased. I can't remember any specific details about these places aside from I was normally dropped outside, it was only 4-5, and they were all different. Any thoughts?

post_text: I dreamt I was out at some type of restaurant, maybe. It seemed kind of old and had old wooden floors. I saw a pregnant women that looked like someone I used to work with her daughter. I dreamt that she looked like she was on drugs and the guy she was with tackled her and was hitting her in the face. I am panicking and in shock and all of a sudden a guy comes out if nowhere and jumps on this guy that hits her and punches him. He hits his nose and makes it bleed. I see it on the ground. It wasn't a lot of it though. I go to the person behind the counter and ask do know how to report domestic abuse? He didn't answer. I then go outside and there is a man who starts talking to me. I didn't want to talk I just asked if he knew how to report domestic abuse. Again no answer. I look over and see this bush like thing with green and purple shamrocks and looked like two red roses on the right side of them. The bush was close to me. That's all I remember. The thing inside with the girl seemed like I was watching a real event. I even remember seeing the girl have a red face after being hit and then it disappeared. Thanks for any interpretations!
comment_text: This dream could be about feeling like you have been abusing yourself,.i.e. doing too much work. It could also be about finding relationships that are non judgemental and loving. The bush with the green and purple shamrocks and the roses might be about your growth/good luck in that department. The colors may be related to the heart and third eye chakras which relate also to mental and physical health. The roses since there are two may be about romantic love but could also be about finding balance with self love.
reply_text: Lauren Wemmer thank you! I could see how that relates to my life

post_text:
Hei. I have had so many sad dreams for about a year. Crying and screaming in my sleep, + it freaks my bf out.
My dad committed suicide 12 years ago, I was 11 at the time. I had a tough time dealing with it for many years, but I’ve been working on letting go and move on for about 3 years.
The dreams are very different, but it’s always the same pattern: my dad comes back for a day, week, month, and he totally ignores me. I try to talk to him but he just pushed me away and talk to everyone else. Then when it’s time for him to go back to “heaven” (I’m not a religious person), he tells me he loves me and misses me, and that I have to move on. And then I scream and cry and wake up crying.

comment_text:
Dream interpretation ideas (if I have more thoughts on this later I will come to add..)

I think you are dreaming of your dad more and more because while the feeling of loss was raw and unprocessed, all you felt was the grief of his loss, and the palpable absence of this person.

You felt "he is gone! He is not here!" And the pain of that was first and foremost.

Now that you are processing the grief, you are moving back to the feeling of his presence, and the joy and comfort that you felt being together with him, the love he had for you.

You always had the joy, love and comfort there too, underneath the pain of loss, but couldn't access it.

Now you can open and access this joy again, because the grief is not making you turn away from the happiness that is there.

Of course this is a scary process - opening to feeling comfort, joy, love, security, happiness, this is a reminder of how that good feeling is something that can be taken away. Which is frightening. And causes inner conflict "maybe I shouldn't feel the joy, because then it will hurt more if I lose that feeling"

The dream is telling you, "you never lost that feeling, it has always been there and it always will be there. The joy is bigger than the grief. The pain turned you away from the joy, the joy never left"

It is saying that your father, in this way, and also in how you are very much like him in many good ways, your father has never left you.

Instead of feeling his absence, you are feeling his presence, as you open up to the positive attachment you felt with him, and as you open up to the side of yourself that is very much like your father.

In the dreams, the contrast of being alone and being with family is a reminder that you are never truly alone when you have loved and been loved. For all those you connect with in life, you live in their hearts, as they live in yours. In this way, there is a life beyond death, time, and place. Karoline Stølhaug good luck to you in healing, trust the work you are doing 💙
reply_text: Nina Kaye thank you, and ofc you’re right. But I have epilepsy, which makes me forget things, especially things in the past. So I guess I’m also very scared of losing those memories and him. He is always with me, I know that, but just feeling his spiritual presence isn’t enough for me if I don’t even remember our time together.. all I have now is small memories, pictures and my mother who helps me remember. But me and my dad had our own “thing”, we were very close and I just feel like I’m losing him in another way. It’s affecting my dreams and sleep, causing stress and sadness which then affects my epilepsy. And I don’t know how to control my dreams or my feelings..

post_text:
Hi all, I had a bit of an odd dream that I woke up from about an hour or so ago.

I can't remember specifically how it started, but there was a male individual that was ousted from my family for something he didn't do. Rather than siding with my family on this one I believed in him as I knew he could never have done what he was being accused of.

At some point, things escalated where my family was planning to chase him away, so the both of us left.

We ended up splitting when we left and I somehow ended up in my dad's apartment. No one was present but his wife, and there was a Golden Retriever there. He was filthy, and as I tried to hose him down I could see all the dirt and grime coming off of him. I thought there was no way I could let him stay there.

Well, I happened to look around and also saw there was a baby, and the baby needed it's diaper changed. That's when my dads wife came in and I became angry, telling her I was going to take the baby as it was obvious she was unfit to take care of her. She was pretty calm during the whole interaction but tried to take her baby back, but eventually relented and went back to her room while I changed the baby.

By the end of it all, I realized that I was just overreacting. At least, in terms of the baby, as it wasn't like she had been crying and put two and two together and figured the baby had probably just made a mess and it wasn't his wife's fault. However, there was definitely no excusing the neglected dog.

I went into her room with the baby and apologized, telling her I knew she was a good mom and that I was sorry for attempting to take her baby, that I knew she would never forgive me if I had taken her.

His wife told me it was alright, that the reason why she didn't fight so hard is because she knew I would make the right decision. She then told me, for whatever reason, that if I wanted from now on I could come and fold her laundry and she's pay me $1.75 every time I did her laundry. I told her no thanks and was planning to leave with the dog, but then I woke up.

I woke up feeling very sad and guilty. I don't normally remember dreams, but this one stuck with me and I couldn't really find anything online about what it could mean.
comment_text: This is about you evolving and taking a stand for yourself in life. Standing up for the male individual was you speaking up for yourself. Taking a stand in life. You speak your peace about the baby but realize that you may have pushed it a bit too much. It's because you are learning about loyalty and how it fits or works in your life. That is why you are cleaning the dog off. This represents your loyalty because dogs are very loyal. You are learning the value of being loyal and becoming loyal to the truth. That is what I see with this dream.

post_text: I keep dreaming about the same man passionately kissing me and being able to actually feel it and the emotions with it.
comment_text: This is you finding something that you are really passionate about. You give yourself fully to this. This is not necessarily about a relationship. I feel this is like finding your passion in life. What you want to do. What gives your life a deeper meaning.

The burning of all material possessions The burning of possessions is about transformation.
You are burning your man made possessions. This is showing a disconnect from your earthly connections. A cleansing symbolically. A more spiritual connection. The outhouse is about elimination of unneeded waste. Cleansing symbolically again. You and family have been going through a cleansing process.

I was sat in the garden with a female relative and watching these ants around us, but they weren't following the scent trail we had put out for them and instead walking down a thin single spiderweb fibre to the grass(from a chair?) So I moved to sit on a chair in the grass with a baby in my arms and was protecting her eyes from the sun ...
Anybthoughts on interpretation?

Some of my nightmares and night terrors are to disturbing to share, particularly with strangers. But I will share one.
I was in a car with a friend and we were giving directions to a stranger. He managed to get out of the car as it slowed. I was not so lucky. He had a phone in the car and I was trying to call my dad to let him know where I was. It turned out that the phone did not work. That's when I said to the stranger I'm in trouble aren't I? He said yes. I said what are your plans. He said I'm going to do some killing tonight(meaning me). In that instant I saw myself in pain and being burried. I tried to get out of the car at high speed, but he then stabbed me with a meat hook and I was being dragged along side the car by the hook in my thigh.
Somehow I got loose and fell into a body of water with aggressive polour bears that went to eat me.
I woke up yelling with blood on my knuckles. (I had probably hit the bedside table).

Dreamt my daughter, who is a mentally disabled adult, was playing with a full grown lion, telling him to lay down, and she would sit on him and comb his hair, and I kept feeling nervous and thinking what if he snaps and kills her, but he just obeys, as if knowingthat she is special and fearless. The next moment he turned white as she was brushing him. It felt scary but also good in a sence when I woke up. Anyone have any thoughts on what this might mean? 🧚‍♀️
comment_text: What an empowering dream! I love it! Your daughter is fighting against societal norms (the lion) and totally taming the beast. This girl can do anything she sets her mind to doing. People tend to love her and change to support her. Letting her live her life independently in society is frightening but you have seen what she can do and she is amazing! Does that make sense?

post_text:
Hello and welcome to the group!

I hope you enjoy and get value from it. This is a group for people interested in dreams but we are generally not professionals or doing this for money, rather for entertainment/self exploration purposes only.

Our interpreters (anyone can interpret) are volunteers and not paid or dedicated to spending all their time here, so please treat them with respect even if what they say doesn't resonate - likewise when interpreting it helps to frame the interpretation as your opinion as opposed to instructing on what the dream means.

If you don't receive a response it is nothing personal, just bad timing. You can post a comment to bump your dream to the top of the feed. I have asked Facebook for a no response filter but so far that hasn't happened, would make things a lot easier!

Please also observe the following recommendations:

Please do not contact interpreters by PM unless they give you permission to do so.

A PM can only be requested by a dreamer - if you are asking Dreamer's to contact you, you will be removed from the group.

Do not use this group to self promote.

Please post more than just a single dream symbol (eg don't just say "I dreamt of a white snake whats it mean?"). Share the whole dream.
comment_text: Thanks for accepting my request. I have many dreams i need help understanding and.I have hope that I will get that help here with you all.

Hello and welcome to the group!

I hope you enjoy and get value from it. This is a group for people interested in dreams but we are generally not professionals or doing this for money, rather for entertainment/self exploration purposes only.

Our interpreters (anyone can interpret) are volunteers and not paid or dedicated to spending all their time here, so please treat them with respect even if what they say doesn't resonate - likewise when interpreting it helps to frame the interpretation as your opinion as opposed to instructing on what the dream means.

If you don't receive a response it is nothing personal, just bad timing. You can post a comment to bump your dream to the top of the feed. I have asked Facebook for a no response filter but so far that hasn't happened, would make things a lot easier!

Please also observe the following recommendations:

Please do not contact interpreters by PM unless they give you permission to do so.

A PM can only be requested by a dreamer - if you are asking Dreamer's to contact you, you will be removed from the group.

Do not use this group to self promote.

Please post more than just a single dream symbol (eg don't just say "I dreamt of a white snake whats it mean?"). Share the whole dream.
comment_text: thanks for letting me join!

comment_text:
I personally would prefer is members would make it their standard to add the following information for a better, more personal explanation.

Things like:

How did the dream make you feel?
(Happy,scared, annoyed, angry etc.)

In what scenery did the dream take place?
(Beach, woods, living room, on the streets etc.)

Mention special, outstanding details
(the color of a car, if the room had windows/doors or not, did the person have a face etc.)

Do u remember having a semi similar dream before? If so, when was it? & could you describe it, or at least mention any similarities you still remember. If you had more then 2 similar dreams, please list their similarities. Like they all had blue cars, or big fishes in them.
(This will indicate if this is a topic that has occupied the dreamer for a longer time. Especially if the dreamer has had multiple dreams with big fish in them, in combination with how the dreams made them feel, is very telling!!!)

I am probably forgetting alot more, however at this moment i think this would be my last request:

A little bit of their back story/current life situation.
(Like in a relationship/
single, religious or not, going to school/working/
unemployed, kids/pets or not, etc. If they dont want to disclose i completely understand however it is very significant for dreams. Like if you dream you are getting married but in fact dont even have a partner, its very different from when you do. Same goes for kids, dream of giving birth when in fact you arent pregnant nor have you ever been, is very different from someone who had 3 kids with a fourth on its way. And if you dream about being or going to school alot, but you haven't been in school for over 20 years, it means something completely different then for someone who is just starting collage... well i think u catch my drift... )

(HOWEVER i need to add one more thing in regards to religion.... put thats more of an opinion then anything else.... to each his own& i honestly respect everyones beliefs, religion & traditions... However it does bother me sometimes that some members plant seeds of panic, in an already panicked member by saying demons are coming for them and they need to pray. Stuff like that.... like, in what way is that a dream explanation?? If they would atleast explain why they state these things... but no. Without any explanation they post under many nightmare posts, to pray, go to church, call the priest, burn sage etc. Like yo i am willing to do all for you, ill ask the pope himself to cleanse your home if it was demon invested... but yooo these "demons" in your dreams, arent real demons, they are symbolic for something, like struggling with your inner demons...
Ok so i needed to get this off my chest, because this is just installing unnecessary fear in people. And it has nothing to do with the actual meaning of a dream.... Dreams contain real important messages for what happends within for us to be unraveled, we dont need prayers but serious dream volunteers to unraffle them. )

(We need priests, prayers, sage, lucky charms & the police or ghost busters to protect us. Lets give them a break and not involve them in dream descriptions.)

post_text:
Intact bones of a chicken running around
ĺike it still had flesh n what nots
comment_text:
Here are a few thoughts

Chicken - to be afraid of something, or to not back down because of fear "dont chicken out"

Katsi Phillips

"Running around like a chicken with it's head cut off" - to rush around frantically without thinking -In a frenzied manner, distractedly, crazily

"Bare bones of a situation"- for the basic unadorned facts to be revealed, just the essentials

"To be reduced to bare-bones"- to have little left, to be in want, need or poverty
reply_text: Nina Kaye thanks 😊

post_text:
Hi. Last night I had my first “nightmare?” Dream in about a year, i stopped having nightmare dreams sense I had my dog sleep with me. Anyways

Dream-

I was with my nana but I never seen her, I just knew it was her and heard her voice, she drove me home from work then I was home (in her house I am NEVER in my own apartment in every dream I remember I am never in my own place) and was making a thing I saw on tiktok where u use sharpie and make little designs and the water makes the design float, you will usually do this in a sink, but I was doing it in a plastic bag and wanted to make like a fish bowl but was failing (lol) the water turned dirty so I went outside on the front deck to drain off the railing. While I did that I hear this noise like a really fast car?, small Toy car? Noise zoom down the street and these two men? Boys? Teens like my age I believe couldn’t catch it so stopped under the street light, it was dusk,they caught eye of me and I did a quick smile and continued on with what I was doing thinking nothing of it. One of the boys wore all black and a hood, he just stood there very thin. But the other dude wicked tall, thin thin, very pale, reddish, light orange hair cut real short started running right at me jumped up the steps real fast and grabbed me, kept grabbing me on my side and trying to take me or hurt me his face was serious like I wasn’t supposed to see what happened and I honestly thought nothing of it. I started screaming because it really scared me and my nana voice was heard loud “HEYYY!!!” And the dude got startled let go of me put his hands up and said “I wasn’t gonna I didn’t” and before he could fished I shoved him as soon as my hands touched him I woke up.

- End dream

Heart racing, legs go numb, chills all over I lay there catching my breath holding my dog and I ￼ instantly had the thought he was an angel. I rolled over on my side, it was super windy out as we had a storm last night, after a few mins of me laying there thinking I head a huge crack (like a tree fell) scared me and I jumped up and looked out my windows before running to the kitchen. Finding a 50+ year old tree had just given up and broke the fence, etc of my yard.
I don’t get scared of noises often but I have very bad ptsd from storms, although I love a thunderstorm.

I’m wondering if this can be a coincidence? Was the “angel”￼ really an angel, why when he heard my nana voice he got scared? Why did he want to hurt me? Why wasn’t my dog there? I always have my dog with me. Why did I never see my nana at all but knew she was there? So many questions, so many possibilities.

I’m now startled to go out front with out someone with me, even with my dog. I feel so dumb, I don’t get scared of people. Even if I am scared I hold my ground. My legs always go numb, shake and feel weak when I’m scared so it’s a feeling that’s not new to me.

I dreamed about seeing the hormone specialist. He looked very old. His hands were shaking when writing down my information on an medical intake form. He didn’t examine me on the visit. He had difficulty spelling my last name. I looked at my medical intake form and told him my last name was spelled incorrect. It was spelled “Dahliwal” He was using a blue ink pen.
comment_text: A desire to be validated or taken seriously. You sometimes may feel invisible
reply_text: Terry Dey, Thank you for the interpretation.

post_text: If anyone wants to take a gander at this, I would appreciate it ❤️

Just last night, I had a hodge podge of stuff in my dream, which is typical for me.

One moment, I was back in high school classrooms, taking notes on my computer and missing lectures and assignments. The next, I was on the school's backlot watching as Sandman from Spider-Man somehow infused his sand with Peter Parker's friends, causing them to melt. Spidey then showed up and invented a a spray that reversed the effects and restore his friends. From the people who came back, I joined them and we established a village. However, a physical fight with someone caused me to get amnesia. A gal pal from college then appeared wearing a bikini and I didn't recognize her, but was intrigued by her Crush soda drink -\-\ I don't remember exactly what I said, but it was something along the lines of "It's funny you're drinking that cuz you're my crush".

I have barely any idea how these scenarios fit together, but it's interesting nonetheless. If there's no logical explanation, what would you say is the meaning behind the individual ideas?
